original_information: "The original material remains in the custody of Meunasah Kruet Teumpeun, Pidie regency".
project_info: Digitising private collections of Acehnese manuscripts located in Pidie and Aceh Besar regencies
collection: Teungku Amir Collection [17th century-20th century]
keterangan: The paper used in the manuscript is European paper with watermark of three crescents. There is no page number, but it has catchword under the text. Th
